main event: A report detailing multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects in Vincennes, Indiana, on 1 September 1956.
interesting points: One sighting involved a very bright light about the size of a 50 cent piece moving rapidly across the sky., The object appeared to be behind thin cloud cover during the observation., The visibility was described as excellent during the sightings., The reports noted varying potential explanations including an aircraft. and balloon., The last sighting mentioned a stationary egg-shaped silver object that faded out of sight after moving southwest.
sighted object: very bright light, egg-shaped silver object
witness description: Civil and military sources indicated observations but specific witnesses were not detailed.
